file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-15-04-04 - CONFIG-2 - SATCOM HANDSET AND CRADLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SATCOM HANDSET AND CRADLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the SATCOM handset and cradle. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FOR AIRCRAFT WITH IRIDIUM-SATELLITE IRIDIUM HANDSET AND CRADLE - RE- 23-15-04-000-801-A COMMUNICATIONS MOVAL SYSTEM FOR AIRCRAFT WITH IRIDIUM-SATELLITE IRIDIUM HANDSET AND CRADLE - IN- 23-15-04-400-801-A COMMUNICATIONS STALLATION SYSTEM EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 23-15-04 Page 1 of 10 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-15-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH IRIDIUM-SATELLITE COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEM 2. IRIDIUM HANDSET AND CRADLE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the Iridium Handset and Cradle. (2) Handset and Cradle 1 are installed on the Lavatory Wall. (3) Handset and Cradle 2 are installed on the LH Galley. (4) Handset and Cradle 3 are installed on the RH Windscreen. (5) Handset and Cradle 4 are installed on the Cockpit/Passenger Cabin Partition. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-21-02-000-801-A/400 FLIGHT ATTENDANT SEAT - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-22-03-000-801-A/400 OVERHEAD BIN - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-22-05-000-801-A/400 PSUS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-30-07-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 262 Lavatory Wall 232 LH Galley 232 RH Windscreen 223 Cockpit/Passenger Cabin Partition D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit or Passenger cabin EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-15-04 Page 2 of 10 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-015-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH IRIDIUM-SATELLITE COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEM (1) To remove Handset and Cradle 1 installed on the Lavatory Wall, do as follows: (a) On the Circuit Breaker Panel (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2), open the TRANSCEIVER 2 circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (b) Remove the overhead bin ( AMM TASK 25-22-03-000-801-A/400) to get access to the electrical connector. (2) To remove Handset and Cradle 2 installed on the LH Galley, do as follows: (a) On the Circuit Breaker Panel (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2), open the TRANSCEIVER 1 circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (b) Remove the LH galley (AMM TASK 25-30-07-000-801-A/400) to get access to the electrical connector. (3) To remove Handset and Cradle 3 installed on the RH Windscreen, do as follows: (a) On the Circuit Breaker Panel (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2), open the TRANSCEIVER 2 circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (b) Remove the overhead bin ( AMM TASK 25-22-03-000-801-A/400). (c) Remove the passenger service unit ( AMM TASK 25-22-05-000-801-A/400) to get access to the electrical connector. (4) To remove Handset and Cradle 4 installed on the Cockpit/Passenger Cabin Partition, do as follows: (a) On the Circuit Breaker Panel (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2), open the TRANSCEIVER 1 circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (b) Remove the shroud assembly ( AMM TASK 25-21-02-000-801-A/400) to get access to the electrical connector. J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) (Figure 403) SUBTASK 020-015-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH IRIDIUM-SATELLITE COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEM (1) To remove Handset and Cradle 1 installed on the Lavatory Wall, do as follows (refer to Figure 401): (a) Disconnect the electrical connector (9). (b) Remove the Handset (8) from the Cradle (6). (c) Remove the screw (4) that attaches the conduit (5). (d) Remove the screw (3) that attaches the clamp (2). (e) Remove the tiedown straps that attach the electrical wires to the Cradle (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-15-04 Page 3 of 10 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (f) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). (g) Remove the screws (7) that attach the Cradle (6). (h) Install the protection cap on the electrical connector (1). (2) To remove Handset and Cradle 2 installed on the LH Galley, do as follows (refer to Figure 402): (a) Disconnect the electrical connector (6). (b) Remove the Handset (5) from the Cradle (3). (c) Remove the screws (1) that attach the access plate. (d) Pull the electrical connector (2) until it comes out. (e) Remove the screws (4) that attach the Cradle (3). (f) Install the protection cap on the electrical connector (2). (3) To remove Handset and Cradle 3, installed on the RH Windscreen, do as follows (refer to Figure 403): (a) Disconnect the electrical connector (5). (b) Remove the Handset (4) from the Cradle (2). (c) Remove the tiedown straps that attach the electrical wires to the Cradle (2). (d) Remove the screws (3) that attach the Cradle (2). (e) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). (f) Install the protection cap on the electrical connector (1). (4) To remove Handset and Cradle 4 installed on the Cockpit/Passenger Cabin Partition as follows (refer to Figure 403): (a) Disconnect the electrical connector (5). (b) Remove the Handset (4) from the Cradle (2). (c) Remove the tiedown straps that attach the electrical wires to the Cradle (2). (d) Remove the screws (3) that attach the Cradle (2). (e) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). (f) Install the protection cap on the electrical connector (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-15-04 Page 4 of 10 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-15-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH IRIDIUM-SATELLITE COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEM 3. IRIDIUM HANDSET AND CRADLE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the Iridium Handset and Cradle. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-15-00-700-801-A/500 - AMM TASK 25-21-02-400-801-A/400 FLIGHT ATTENDANT SEAT - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-22-03-400-801-A/400 OVERHEAD BIN - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-22-05-400-801-A/400 PSUS - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-30-07-400-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 262 Lavatory Wall 232 Froward galley 232 RH windscreen 223 Cockpit/Passenger cabin partition D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS3367-1-9 Tiedown Strap AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit or Passenger cabin EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-15-04 Page 8 of 10 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) (Figure 403) SUBTASK 420-015-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH IRIDIUM-SATELLITE COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEM (1) To install Handset and Cradle 1 on the Lavatory Wall, do as follows (refer to Figure 401): (a) Remove the protection cap from the electrical connector (1). (b) Connect the electrical connector (1). (c) Put the clamp (2) in position and install the screw (3). (d) Put the conduit (5) in position and install the screw (5). (e) Put the Cradle (6) in position and install the screws (7) that attach the Cradle (6). (f) Connect the electrical connector (9). (g) Put the Handset (8) on the Cradle (6). (2) To install Handset and Cradle 2 on the LH Galley, do as follows (refer to Figure 402): (a) Remove the protection cap from the electrical connector (2). (b) Connect the electrical connector (2). (c) Put the Cradle (3) in position and install the screws (4) that attach the Cradle (3). (d) Put the access plate in position and install the screws (1). (e) Connect the electrical connector (5). (f) Put the Handset (6) on the Cradle (4). (3) To install Handset and Cradle 3 on the RH Windscreen, do as follows (refer to Figure 403): (a) Remove the protection cap from the electrical connector (1). (b) Connect the electrical connector (1). (c) Put the Cradle (2) in position and install the screws (3). (d) Install the tiedown straps that attach the electrical wires to the Cradle (2). (e) Connect the electrical connector (5). (f) Put the Handset (4) on the Cradle (2). (4) To install Handset and Cradle 4 on the RH Windscreen, do as follows (refer to Figure 403): (a) Remove the protection cap from the electrical connector (1). (b) Connect the electrical connector (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-15-04 Page 9 of 10 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (c) Put the Cradle (2) in position and install the screws (3). (d) Install the tiedown straps that attach the electrical wires to the Cradle (2). (e) Connect the electrical connector (5). (f) Put the Handset (4) on the Cradle (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-015-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH IRIDIUM-SATELLITE COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEM (1) For Handset and Cradle 1 installed on the Lavatory Wall, do as follows: (a) On the Circuit Breaker Panel (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2), close the TRANSCEIVER 2 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (b) Install the overhead bin ( AMM TASK 25-22-03-400-801-A/400). (2) For Handset and Cradle 2 installed on the LH Galley, do as follows: (a) On the Circuit Breaker Panel (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2), close the TRANSCEIVER 1 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (b) Install the LH galley (AMM TASK 25-30-07-400-801-A/400). (3) For Handset and Cradle 3 installed on the RH Windscreen, do as follows: (a) On the Circuit Breaker Panel (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2), close the TRANSCEIVER 2 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (b) Install the passenger service unit ( AMM TASK 25-22-05-400-801-A/400). (c) Install the overhead bin ( AMM TASK 25-22-03-400-801-A/400). (4) For Handset and Cradle 4 installed on the Cockpit/Passenger Cabin Partition, do as follows: (a) On the Circuit Breaker Panel (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2), close the TRANSCEIVER 1 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (b) Install the shroud assembly ( AMM TASK 25-21-02-400-801-A/400). (5) Do the Telephone System operational test (AMM TASK 23-15-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-15-04 Page 10 of 10 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
